00022 require_once 'creole/IdGenerator.php';
00023 
00031 class PgSQLIdGenerator implements IdGenerator {
00032     
00034     private $conn;
00035 
00041     public function __construct(Connection $conn)
00042     {
00043         $this->conn = $conn;
00044     }
00045     
00049     public function isBeforeInsert()
00050     {
00051         return true;
00052     }    
00053     
00057     public function isAfterInsert()
00058     {
00059         return false;
00060     }
00061         
00065     public function getIdMethod()
00066     {
00067         return self::SEQUENCE;
00068     }
00069     
00073     public function getId($name = null)
00074     {
00075         if ($name === null) {
00076             throw new SQLException("You must specify the sequence name when calling getId() method.");
00077         }
00078         $rs = $this->conn->executeQuery("SELECT nextval('" . pg_escape_string ( $name ) . "')", ResultSet::FETCHMODE_NUM);
00079         $rs->next();
00080         return $rs->getInt(1);
00081     }
00082     
00083 }
